body_html:
The error strictly looks like a compiler bug, so I do not have any ideas.

./tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op_cpu_impl.h:137:3: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault
   }
   ^
Please submit a full bug report,
with preprocessed source if appropriate.
See <file:///usr/share/doc/gcc-5/README.Bugs> for instructions.

I recommend looking into existing GCC issues.

body:
The error strictly looks like a compiler bug, so I do not have any ideas.
```
./tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_nd_op_cpu_impl.h:137:3: internal compiler error: Segmentation fault
   }
   ^
Please submit a full bug report,
with preprocessed source if appropriate.
See <file:///usr/share/doc/gcc-5/README.Bugs> for instructions.
```
I recommend looking into existing GCC issues.
